thread.title: Live: Power cut in Cornwall leaves thousands left without electricity AGAIN
thread.title_full: Live: Power cut in Cornwall leaves thousands left without electricity AGAIN

author: Shannon Brown
title: Live: Power cut in Cornwall leaves thousands left without electricity AGAIN
text:
News Live: Power cut in Cornwall leaves thousands left without electricity AGAIN Homes in two main areas are without electricity cornwalllive Bookmark
Share
By Shannon Brown Reporter Updated 22:23, 13 DEC 2024 Bookmark
Homes in Perranporth and Redruth are without electricity (Image: Getty Images) About 2,500 homes and businesses in Cornwall are without power tonight as two wide spread outages leave families in the dark. National Grid says residents in Perranporth and near Redruth lost electricity at around 6.50pm today (Friday, December 13) and are expected to be without power until around midnight.
Of both power cuts, National Grid said: "We are aware of this power cut outage which was raised at 6:52pm this evening and our engineers are working to get the power returned as quickly as possible. We are sorry for any inconvenience this is causing you."
More than 1,600 properties in Perranporth are affected, while more than 800 are off-grid just outside Redruth.
This is a live blog. Scroll below for more updates.
22:23 Jeff Reines Flickering Everyone's lights are flickering in Cornwall and now we know why. Read the full story here .
Share 22:22 Jeff Reines Sparks Power cables SPARKING in Cornwall - because of sea salt. Read the full story here .
Share 22:19 Jeff Reines More Four properties at Hayle.
42 at Blackwater.
Share 22:00 Shannon Brown Power cuts ongoing The power cuts in Perranporth and Redruth are still ongoing as of 10pm tonight. Check back here tomorrow for more updates.
Share 21:33 Shannon Brown 84 properties left with out electricity In a Redruth update, given at around 9pm, National Grid said:
Properties restored: 794
Properties off supply: 84
Share 21:21 Jeff Reines Always keep up ⚠️ Want the latest Cornwall breaking news and top stories first? Share 21:21 Jeff Reines Smaller outage There are 52 properties affected in far east Cornwall, at West Curry. Postcodes affected are PL15 8NS, PL15 8NT, PL15 8NU, PL15 8WG, PL15 9RN.
The outage started at 4.26pm and is not estimated to be restored for 24 hours - about 4.30pm tomorrow.
